TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplatePagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示可讓您建立自訂分頁 UI 的 欄位。

span.span: Represents a field that enables you to create a custom paging UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用物件，以顯示 瀏覽控制項，可讓使用者逐頁查看資料所實作的控制項顯示介面。Use the object to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data that is displayed by a control that implements the interface. (例如控制項。)您也可以使用物件來顯示基礎資料來源，例如記錄總數和目前的頁碼的相關資訊。(An example is the control.) You can also use the object to display information about the underlying data source, such as total number of records and the current page number. 欄位沒有任何內建的配置。The field has no built-in layout. 因此，您必須明確建立的配置範本。Therefore, you must explicitly create the layout in the template. 您可以使用階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別或內嵌樣式項目格式化內容。You can format the content by using cascading style sheets (CSS) classes or inline style elements. 您可以參考控制項，其中包含物件使用`Container`屬性。You can reference the control that contains the object by using the `Container` property. 當您想要建立繫結運算式，來顯示已擷取的多少筆記錄、 總數的頁面，以及類似的資訊，這非常有用。This is useful when you want to create binding expressions to show how many records were retrieved, the total number of pages, and similar information. 這些繫結運算式可以使用的屬性控制這類， ， ，和。These binding expressions can use properties of the control such as , , , and . 欄位會提供事件，通常用來執行工作中的按鈕時按一下範本時。The field provides the event, which is typically used to perform a task when a button in the template is clicked. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何新增欄位中控制項。The following example shows how to add a field in a control. 這個範例會使用以顯示目前的頁碼、 總頁數，以及記錄總數。This example uses the to display the current page number, the total number of pages, and the total number of records. 控制項還包含兩個欄位和欄位顯示 瀏覽控制項，可讓使用者逐頁查看資料。The control also contains two fields and a field to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/CS/TemplatePagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/VB/TemplatePagerFieldVB.aspx#1)] 下列範例示範如何使用事件來執行不同的動作，視所按的按鈕在欄位。The following example shows how to use the event to perform a different action depending on which button was clicked in a field. 這個範例會使用顯示瀏覽控制項，可讓使用者逐頁查看資料。This example uses the to display navigation controls that enable users to page through data. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand/CS/OnPagerCommandCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField.OnPagerCommand/VB/OnPagerCommandVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式通常用來以動態方式將欄位加入至控制項。This constructor is typically used to dynamically add fields to a control. 若要新增以動態方式為物件控制項，建立新物件。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object. 設定其屬性，將控制項加入至它，然後將它加入的欄位集合控制項。Set its properties, add controls to it, and then add it to the field collection for the control.

span.span: Copies the properties of the current object to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法來複製目前的內容物件傳入的物件`newField`參數。It is used by the method to copy the properties of the current object to the object that is passed in the `newField` parameter. ## Examples [ListView Web 伺服器控制項概觀ListView Web Server Control Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8b4da934-2f5e-4b5a-b03d-fca5e15f85af)

span.span: Call the base class's method so that the properties of the class are also copied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是協助程式方法，以供方法。The method is a helper method that is used by the method. 方法會填入所指定的物件`container`參數中所包含的子控制項範本。The method populates the object that is specified by the `container` parameter with the child controls that are contained in the template.

span.span: Handles events that occur in the object and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法以處理中發生的事件物件的按鈕控制項內按一下時。It is used by the method to handle events that occur in the object when a button inside the control is clicked. 方法會叫用方法，並檢查屬性。The method invokes the method and examines the property. 如果已變更，這個方法會叫用方法來更新網頁內容的控制項。If has changed, this method invokes the method to update the page properties of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void OnPagerCommand (System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs e);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnPagerCommand(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnPagerCommand (e As DataPagerCommandEventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnPagerCommand(System::Web::UI::WebControls::DataPagerCommandEventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnPagerCommand : System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs -> unit override this.OnPagerCommand : System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerCommandEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中按一下按鈕時，會引發事件物件。The event is raised when a button is clicked in the object. 這可讓您每次這個事件發生時執行自訂的常式。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也可讓衍生的類別，而不需要附加委派處理事件。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

exception.span: 沒有 事件的處理常式。

span.span: There is no handler for the event.

para.span: 當您覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。

span.span: When you override in a derived class, call the base class' method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 按一下 物件中的按鈕時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a button is clicked in a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中按一下按鈕時，會引發事件物件。The event is raised when a button is clicked in a object. 這可讓您每次這個事件發生時執行自訂的常式。This enables you to perform a custom routine whenever this event occurs. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用事件來執行不同的動作，視所按的按鈕在物件。The following example shows how to use the event to perform a different action depending on which button was clicked in a object. Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中頁面巡覽區欄位的自訂內容。

span.span: Gets or sets the custom content for the pager field in a control.

value.span: 範本物件，包含 控制項中頁面巡覽區欄位的自訂內容。

span.span: A template object that contains the custom content for the pager field in a control.

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性尚未設定。

span.span: The default is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來定義分頁資料的自訂使用者介面 (UI)。Use the property to define a custom user interface (UI) for paging data. 範本通常包含逐頁查看資料的導覽控制項。The template usually contains navigation controls to page through data. 它也可以用來顯示基礎資料來源，例如記錄總數或目前的頁碼的相關資訊。It can also be used to display information about the underlying data source, such as the total number of records or the current page number. 若要以宣告方式建立自訂範本，將放`PagerTemplate`內的項目物件。To create a custom template declaratively, put a `PagerTemplate` element inside the object. 您可以接著將內容新增至`PagerTemplate`項目。You can then add the contents to the `PagerTemplate` element. 您可以參考繫結中的運算式中的控制項使用的範本`Container`屬性。You can reference the control in binding expressions in the template by using the `Container` property. 這個屬性會提供屬性的存取權控制項，其中包括， ，和屬性。This property provides access to the properties of the control, which includes the , , and properties. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將控制項加入存取屬性的範本控制項。The following example shows how to add controls to the template that access properties of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/CS/TemplatePagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatePagerField/VB/TemplatePagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]
